scenario_text.value: That Aoi was a fake.

It’s good that we noticed. Good looking out
there, Agumon.

Ehehe, glad to help! But then, where’s the
real Aoi?

I dunno... Maybe we should look around here
a bit more?

They might be around somewhere. Let’s look
a little longer.
Rrg...
Mm...
Ah... Here, Takuma! I found Aoi!
...Agumon? Oh, and Takuma?!
Wait... Labramon. Where’s Labramon?!

I’m here, Aoi! I’m fine, I just saw a nasty
vision, that’s all.
I’m so glad you’re okay, Labramon!
Oh, where are the others? Are they safe?

...Yep, this is the genuine article, all
right.
Yeah! That’s the sweet Aoi we know!
Huh...? Wh-what’s this all about?
Leave the others to me, okay?

You don’t look too good, Aoi. Take a load
off, ’kay?
But...
No, you’re right. I’d just hold you back.

We’ll follow you when Aoi’s recovered her
strength. Take care of everyone until then!
We’re on this! Let’s go, Takuma!
